author: Reuters Editorial
title: Saudi Aramco CEO Nasser says IPO work to be completed in second half
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - Saudi Aramco Chief Executive Officer Amin Nasser said on Thursday that all work required from the oil giant for its initial public offering (IPO), which could be the biggest in history, will be completed in the second half of 2018.
FILE PHOTO: Saudi Aramco Chief Executive Officer Amin Nasser speaks at the annual CERAWeek energy conference in Houston, Texas, U.S., March 6, 2018. REUTERS/Maria Caspani Speaking at a conference in London, Nasser added that the decision on the listing venue “and the rest is a job for the shareholder”.
Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman on Wednesday embarked on a trip to Britain and the United States, which could shape the decision on where to list the company.
London and New York are among the leading financial centers seen as frontrunners to host the international leg of the flotation alongside a Riyadh listing.
Reporting by Dasha Afanasieva and Clara Denina
